snippet: The police said Thursday that they prevented a 17-year-old’s elaborate plot to kill his family and bomb the junior and senior high school in Waseca, south of Minneapolis.
abstract: Police in Minnesota halt 17-year-old's plot to kill his family and blow up school in Waseca; teen is charged in juvenile court with attempted first-degree murder, possessing explosive or incendiary devices and criminal damage to property.
lead_paragraph: The police said Thursday that they prevented a 17-year-old’s elaborate plot to kill his family and bomb the junior and senior high school in Waseca, south of Minneapolis.

headline.main: Minnesota: Police Halt Teenager’s Plot to Kill Family and Blow Up School
headline.print_headline: Minnesota: Police Halt Teenager’s Plot to Kill Family and Blow Up School
